content: **crocheted blanket for babies in drops sky the piece is worked with lace pattern texture and puff-stitches ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no skip-002-by yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** width 47-66 cm length 52-80 cm **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150 g colour 03 light beige **crochet gauge ** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
